728887f-b.title: Richmond: Great Kills Road - Mansion Avenue
728887f-b.text:
9reat Eills Road, adjoining the N.E. corner nf Mansion
Avenue, showing the old Seguine Nouse. Buuherk 1853mwp,
Beers's 1874 map, and Robinson's maps of 1898 and 1907 show
the house to have belonged to the family of J.G. Seguine.
P.L. Sperr states that the house later became known as the
Britton House. The view is north from the Great Eills Shore.
March 24, 1919
By Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Looking south from near Hylan Boulevard.
May 14, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTION8
(3)
A view of the approach to the north side of the house.
May 14, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728887f-b.folder: Great Kills Road & Mansion Avenue, Staten Island, NY
